alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 05 at 11:04AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Hydrologic Outlook for the following rivers... Neosho River near Emporia 3nw This hydrologic outlook is based on the forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours and estimated runoff from earlier rainfall. Crests may vary if actual rainfall or runoff is greater or less than anticipated. Location: Neosho River near Emporia 3nw Flood stage: 19.0 feet Latest stage: 13.6 feet at 8 AM Sunday Maximum Forecast Stage: 19.4 feet at 7 PM Monday Jun 06 Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Mon 1pm 1am 1pm Neosho River Emporia 3nw 19.0 13.6 Sun 8am 14.0 15.2 18.0 Later statements, possibly warnings, may be issued as additional information becomes available.
